price: Yeroma ji’as ba’aa ta'ee argu "kuni Gooftaa kiyya" jedhe. Yeroo inni seenus "odoo Gooftaan kiyya na qajeelchuu baatee silaa ani ummata jallattoota irraan ta’a" jedhe.
arabic: فَلَمَّا رَءَا ٱلۡقَمَرَ بَازِغٗا قَالَ هَٰذَا رَبِّيۖ فَلَمَّآ أَفَلَ قَالَ لَئِن لَّمۡ يَهۡدِنِي رَبِّي لَأَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: falammā raā al-qamara bāzighan qāla hādhā rabbī falammā afala qāla la-in lam yahdinī rabbī la-akūnanna mina al-qawmi al-ḍālīna
